net.sf.hajdbc.balancer.simple

Class SimpleBalancer<Z,D extends Database<Z>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.hajdbc.balancer.AbstractBalancer<Z,D>
      • net.sf.hajdbc.balancer.AbstractSetBalancer<Z,D>
        • net.sf.hajdbc.balancer.simple.SimpleBalancer<Z,D>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - either java.sql.Driver or javax.sql.DataSource
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<D>, Collection<D>, Set<D>, Balancer<Z,D>

    public class SimpleBalancer<Z,D extends Database<Z>>
extends AbstractSetBalancer<Z,D>
    Trivial balancer implementation whose next() implementation always returns the database with the highest weight.
    Author:
    Paul Ferraro
